overview: Gumby is pursued by a large Catmull Hand.  Modeled, animated and rendered at NYIT Computer Graphics Lab. In this 3D geometric world, Gumby is made of polygons, not green clay.  Hand model from Catmull data set, flex software by R. Lundin, with joints added by H. Grebe.  Presented at SIGGRAPH '84 & '85 Electronic Theatres.
title: Gumby 3D Computer Animation
